channel.title: Posts on Ramana: TIL
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ramana: TIL

item.title: Delete older git branches
item.description: Every few months, I find myself finding the command to delete all my old branches. To the future me, for k in $(git branch | sed /\*/d); do if [ -z "$(git log -1 --since='1 week ago' -s $k)" ]; then git branch -D $k fi done

item.title: Concurrent processes in bash
item.description: I learnt how to spawn background process in bash and wait for them to finish.

item.title: Concatenate comma separated strings in bash
item.description: I learnt how to concatenate an array of strings in bash using ChatGPT.
